summary: "The Lord of the Rings: The Rings of Power" is a fantasy TV series based on J.R.R. Tolkien's Middle-earth stories. It was made by Amazon and costs a lot of money. The show is set long before the events in Tolkien's books and tells important stories from that time. It has a big international cast and was filmed in New Zealand, where the movies were also made. The first season had eight episodes and came out in 2022. It was very popular and people liked its visual effects. But some people thought the writing could have been better. The second season was released in 2024 and had similar reviews.
title: The Lord of the Rings The Rings of Power
